means: 明亮地，显然地，易觉察地

sentence.Network_en: To force this agreement on the nation is transparently wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 把这一协定强加于全体国民显然是错误的。

sentence.Network_en: The system was clearly not functioning smoothly or transparently.
sentence.Network_cn: 该系统显然运行并不顺畅，也不明晰。

sentence.Network_en: The book is remarkably accurate and transparently fair-minded.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书记述确凿，言辞明晰，见解公正。

entry.def: If an object or substance is transparent, you can see through it.

example.ex: I looked at his thin face with its almost transparent skin.
example.tran: 我看着他清瘦的脸，脸上肌肤几近透明。

entry.tran: 易懂的;明晰的;一目了然的
entry.def: If a situation, system, or activity is transparent, it is easily understood or recognized.

example.ex: We are now striving hard to establish a transparent parliamentary democracy…
example.tran: 我们现在正努力建立明晰的议会民主制。

example.ex: The company has to make its accounts and operations as transparent as possible.
example.tran: 公司必须使其账目与运作尽可能地清晰透明。

entry.def: You use transparent to describe a statement or action that is obviously dishonest or wrong, and that you think will not deceive people.

example.ex: …a transparent effort by officials to blame foreigners…
example.tran: 官员指摘外国人的明显企图

example.ex: He thought he could fool people with transparent deceptions.
example.tran: 他以为他能用那些可以一眼看穿的鬼把戏愚弄人。

means.word_mean: 1. so as to be easily understood or seen through;
2. so as to allow the passage of light;

sentences.sentence: "the red brilliance of the claret shines transparently in our glasses"

auth_sentence.content: Three plates of transparently thin ham were finally produced.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three plates of transparently thin ham were finally produced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three plates of transparently thin ham were finally produced.

auth_sentence.content: If that relationship is transparently disclosed, it is not ghostwriting.
auth_sentence.res_content: If that relationship is transparently disclosed, it is not ghostwriting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If that relationship is transparently disclosed, it is not ghostwriting.

auth_sentence.content: I have yet to see you post it clearly and transparently.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have yet to see you post it clearly and transparently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have yet to see you post it clearly and transparently.
